anya-e0105n27:1_0: Visuddhimaggo pana na kevalaṁ pubbe vuttappakāreneva kato,
anya-e0105n27:1_2: Tathā hi ācariyabuddhaghosatthero porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi samāharitvā bhāsāparivattanavasena dassentopi yā yā atthavaṇṇanā vā vinicchayo vā saṁsayitabbo hoti,
anya-e0105n27:1_3: tattha tattha vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttanti vā (1, 263), vinayaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ,
anya-e0105n27:1_10: aṭṭhakathāsu vinicchayoti vā, evaṁ tāva dīghabhāṇakā,
anya-e0105n27:1_12: aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana…pe… ayaṁ kamo vutto, so pāḷiyā na sametīti vā (1, 309), evaṁ tāva majjhimabhāṇakā,
anya-e0105n27:1_14: saṁyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttanti vā (2, 63), aṭṭhakathāyaṁ panāti vā (2,
anya-e0105n27:1_15: 80) evaṁ taṁtaṁatthavaṇṇanāvinicchayānaṁ nissayampi vibhāvetvā pacchimajanānaṁ uppajjamānasaṁsayaṁ vinodentoyeva te dassesi.
anya-e0105n27:2_0: Tenimassa visuddhimaggassa karaṇakāle sabbāpi sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo ācariyassa santike santīti ca,
anya-e0105n27:2_1: pubbeyeva tā ācariyena sīhaḷattherānaṁ santike sutāti ca,
anya-e0105n27:2_2: tāhi gahetabbaṁ sabbaṁ gahetvā ayaṁ visuddhimaggo ācariyena likhitoti ca ayamattho ativiya pākaṭo hoti. Tasmā yaṁ mahāvaṁse –
anya-e0105n27:3_0: ‘‘Saṅgho gāthādvayaṁ tassā’dāsi sāmatthiyaṁ tavā’’tiādinā ‘‘gāthādvayameva oloketvā kiñcipi aññaṁ potthakaṁ anoloketvā ācariyabuddhaghoso visuddhimaggaṁ akāsī’’ti adhippāyena abhitthutivacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
